titleStmt.title: Die Veneris, 27 Septembr. 1650. Upon report from the Committee for Suppressing Licentious and Impious Practices under Pretence of Religion, Liberty, &c. ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Committee for Suppressing Licentious and Impious Practices Under Pretence of Religion, Liberty, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Husband and John Field, printers to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Ordering that Major Rainborow be discharged from the office of Justice of the Peace, and that Laurence Clarkson be banished and his book burnt.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
